header.title: International Association of Travel Agents Network

group.bdy:
International Association of Travel Agents Network (IATAN) is an industry association designed to represent the interests of their member companies.
In addition, they (along with the IATA) are the body responsible for the standard international codes for airlines, airports, hotels, cities, and car rental firms (for example, the three-digit codes that designate
London Heathrow Airport as LHR). These codes provides a method to link international travel network with internations suppliers.1
Mission statement
Source: IATAN Official Site1
IATAN's mission is to promote professionalism, administer meaningful and impartial business standards, and to provide cost-effective products, services and educational programs that benefit the travel industry.
